author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Linux Foundation Education is running its annual CyberWeek promotion, with BIG savings on training, courses, and certifications to help support your developer journey. Offers end December 11, don't miss out!

CyberWeek promotions: https://hubs.la/Q02-rGWd0
title: CyberWeek is here! Save BIG on Linux Foundation courses and certifications
